Hello.text: Hello, I'm a backend developer based in Moscow!

About.title: About
About.text: Nick is a backend developer based in Moscow, specializing in Golang, with a newfound passion for frontend development. He has been coding since middle school and, for over 6 years, has been crafting innovative solutions. He has also competed in three hackathons, securing prize-winning positions each time. Beyond coding, he is an avid traveler with a love for Japan and is currently learning Japanese. He enjoys collecting vinyl records and shooting with a film camera.

Bio.title: Bio
Bio.uni: Completed a bachelor's program in applied informatics at the Bauman Moscow State Technical University

Love.title: I ♥
Love.text: Music, traveling, Japanese language, film photography, vinyl records
